## About Me
I'm a mechatronics engineer with 3 years’ experience developing smart devices for home automation. 
I’ve helped bring products like motorized windows and automated sliding doors to life. 
I love tackling complex challenges and building tech that makes everyday life easier for everyday people.
At my core, I believe in doing hard things, giving more than I take, and always staying curious.
I'm looking for opportunities where I can keep innovating and add real value to a forward-thinking team.
